Burning Hammer looked around puzzled. Perplex walked by him.

Perplex: What=
's wrong?

Burning Hammer: I don't know where the conference room is.

Sarg=
e walked up next to Burning Hammer.

Perplex: Follow me.

Perplex walked to=
 the conference room and Burning Hammer and Sarge followed him there. The 3=
 waited for Grounded. Zeni came in shortly later.

Perplex: Where'd you get=
 a commlink, little guy?

Zeni: From Arrow.

Arrow walked in and Perplex lo=
oked at him.

Arrow: What do you want? If you don't want something, don't l=
ook at me like that...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: gunthers8@n=
etscape.net 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 26, 2001 1=
1:51 PM
  Subject: Groundeds Calling


  Grounded heard everything that was=
 commencing. About Deemos, and 
  Trinity. "I must do something." He opened=
 a comm link to all of the 
  Chivtron. "This is Grounded, I am calling a m=
eeting starting 
  immediatly.  Meet in the confernece room. It is urgent a=
nd invaluable 
  to miss for our defense. Thank you." He began a walk for t=
he 
  Conference room.


   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to htt=
p://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
